posts.description: Reemerging from yet another hey-let's-totally-fall-off-the-radar-for-a-couple-weeks hiatus! üëã And now back to our regularly scheduled programming of desserts covered in sprinkles. Vanilla-almond snack cake with rhubarb-mascarpone icing, coming soon to @vermontcreamery's recipe archives! üíñ

You guys. I didn't need a jacket yesterday. Today it's nearly 70 and the windows are open for the first time this year. I think it's safe to say it's actually spring, for reals! (Not like a couple weeks ago when the calendar said winter was over but the weather said, "Ha! Did you forget where you live??" ‚ùÑÔ∏èüñï‚ùÑÔ∏è) Ready to head out into the world in a dress SANS TIGHTS. Hope I don't blind anyone with my hyper-pale, Northeast winter legs. üíÉüåº‚òÄÔ∏è

@dj_fuents and I are heading over to @breadandbutterfarm this morning for a mozzarella making class with @henrys_dairy! Looking forward to farm-touring and cheese-making, not to mention post-lesson snacking. üêÆüßÄüòã

All that remains of the 84 cupcakes I made for @redhousevt's Kickstarter celebration last night! Thanks so much to @stonecutterspirits for hosting and supplying the nonstop delicious drinks, to @vermontcreamery for all the scrumptious cheeses, to @healthylivingvt for all the perfect cheese accompaniments, and to @beautifulbrinysea for the amazing sugars and sprinkles that made these cupcakes possible! And thank you to @dj_fuents for being my driving partner and cupcake carrier. ü§ó It was so great to see old friends and make some new ones! üíï‚ú®ü•Ç

FACT: Sprinkle heaven is a place and just so happens to currently be located at my apartment. Was so surprised and delighted to find these awesome sprinkle mixes in a package from @beautifulbrinysea yesterday! There's a rainbow dessert blend, a chocolate blend that reminds me of every outfit I wanted to wear in the early '90s, and an Amy Sedaris blend with giant sprinkles that say "i like you." üòÇ Can't wait to use these guys on the bazillion cupcakes I'm making for our @redhousevt + @stonecutterspirits party tonight! üç∏üéÇüëØ‚ú®

Psyched to be heading to @miserylovescovt's annual sugar shack dinner tonight! (Especially with @stonecutterspirits working her magic at cocktail hour. üç∏‚ú®) So ready to OD on all the maple things with @lostpyramid, @dj_fuents, and @jg_murphy. üíÉüçÅ

Vermont friends! If you're looking for something fun to do this Friday, I'm hosting a little party with @redhousevt at the @stonecutterspirits tasting room in Middlebury to celebrate @redhousevt's nearly funded Kickstarter. ü§ó There will be Clue-themed cocktails, tons of delicious @vermontcreamery cheeses and all the necessary accompaniments from @healthylivingvt, and cupcakes made by yours truly! And we'll be making things extra tasty with all sorts of @beautifulbrinysea goodies. üòã Fun starts at 6:00! Come say üëã and get some cheese and treats before I eat them all.

Cupcake testing for a cocktails & cupcakes party this Friday! (Rough life over here, you guys, for real. ‚úåÔ∏è) We're going to be celebrating @redhousevt's nearly funded Kickstarter at @stonecutterspirits's tasting room in Middlebury! I'm so excited for Britt and Matt (and drinks and cake! üòã). Stay tuned for details. ü§ó P.S. Happy birthday to two of my favorite people, Aron of @facturegoods and @saslabs of @stonecutterspirits! Sending these virtual cupcakes your way. üç∞üéàüéâ

Just returned from dropping off all the lovely @farmhousepottery pieces we borrowed for our workshop last week! Sad to say goodbye to all that beautiful dinnerware, but at least I got to keep one of these adorable soup bowls for myself. ü§ó Wouldn't mind filling it with some tasty soup either, since apparently there's another winter storm rolling in tonight... Nothing like celebrating the arrival of spring with more snow. üôÑ‚ùÑÔ∏è #fweevents

Had a super fun @vermontcreamery shoot yesterday with @farmandapron! We usually keep things on the lighter side but sometimes I like to sneak in a few moody shots, especially when it involves adorable little cr√®me br√ªl√©es in repurposed St. Albans crocks (which are the prettiest matte grey color). Also featuring an awesome vintage tray I snagged at the Waterbury flea market for $2 + @nershiwoodworks, who was forced to hand model due to his choice of shirt color. üï∫üì∏
